system.sustained: Psyker Grasps a targets vital organs with a psychic grip, make Opposed Willpower Test vs Target, if psyker wins target is stunned for one round, +1 round per Degree of Success. If 4+ Degrees of Success target also takes 1d5 Rending Damage that ignores armour and toughness. Has no effect on non-living creatures or targets with the Machine Trait.
